content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully established on the map. Several attempts were made to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but each placement or crafting effort failed due to missing inventory items and unavailable resources. Other operations (such as using existing furnaces for smelting) were performed on pre‐existing game entities rather than through agent–initiated structure placement.

ERROR TIPS
• API Call Errors for Entity Retrieval  
 – Avoid supplying unsupported keyword arguments (for example, do not use “radius” when the API expects no keyword parameters).  
 – Match the function’s signature exactly; using positional arguments when the function is defined to take none will trigger errors.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures  
 – Verify that the required Lab item is present in inventory before attempting placement.  
 – Ensure that resource prerequisites (such as sufficient iron-plates, iron-gear-wheels, copper-cables, and electronic-circuits) are met prior to and during lab crafting.  
 – Check that all sub–ingredient production processes are operational (e.g., proper furnace smelting setups) so that lab crafting does not fail due to missing intermediary products.

• Iterating over Non–Iterable Results  
 – Before performing iterations on entities (like filtering labs), confirm that the retrieval function returns a valid list rather than None to avoid “NoneType” iteration errors.
